casebody.data:
In re: Skinner 277A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2016 Ira Braswell, IV, Attorney at Law, Louisburg, for Skinner, Mark. Jenna F. Butler, Attorney at Law, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Clark, Nancy Bass, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of December 2016 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2016."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 28th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
